title: Sanctuary of Mercury Canetonnessis
description: Findspot of the so-called "Berthouville Treasure," discovered in 1830 in the hamlet of Villeret in the French commune of Berthouville. A temple and a theater of presumed Roman imperial date were subsequently excavated in the late 19th century. The site is not visible today, but a resistivity survey was conducted in 2005 (Thierry).

properties.description: Representative point location determined through analysis of imagery in Google Earth and maps in Babelon and Thierry.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Sanctuary Centerpoint
